articles.title: About this blog
articles.description: Sharing our experience as data scientists at 2DII
articles.contents:
In this blog we share our data science experience at 2DII. Here are
some of the projects you may read about:
ds-incubator:
Weekly meetups to share best practices.
coding-helpdesk:
Live support by appointment.
r2dii: A
collection of R packages we maintain.
